citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:10 am to
11:40 am on 09-Apr-18.
Attempts to make contact with the licensee were done by honking the GOV's horn, waiting in the driveway for 30
minutes and calling the licensee's phone numbers and leaving a message.
Additional Inspectors
Osborne Stephanie, Animal Care Inspector
